page.title: Adverbs and AdvP - Reason or Purpose Adverbs
page.introduction:
Reason or purpose adverbs include therefore and so. Reason or purpose can also be expressed by a prepositional phrase, such as for this reason or on purpose, and by an adverbial clause beginning with because or since or in order. Reason or purpose adverbs do not allow modifiers (at least in English). The structure of these adverbial clauses will be addressed in
Adverbial Clauses.
